description:
Ekoda-chan and her friends go through a bit of a redesign, in this short brought to you by Shigino Akira (Crayon Shin-chan movies, Yatterman 2008) and Tatsumi Yuiko (Etotama, The Irregular at Magic High School).
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: Kantoku to Ekoda-chan Ra no Zadankai - Shigino Akira x Tatsumi Yuiko
Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: The Director and Ekoda-chan`s Naked Chat 3 - Shigino Akira x Tatsumi Yuiko
臨死!! 江古田ちゃん 監督と江古田ちゃん裸[ら]の座談会 しぎのあきら x 巽悠衣子
